name: Fiona Hall
membership:
Board member of eceee, www.eceee.org
Board member and Friend of the Coalition for Energy Saving energycoalition.eu/
goal: To provide advice and services primarily in the fields of energy, climate change and environment, with the goal of building a fair and sustainable world.
euInitiatives:
Clean Energy for All Europeans package, in particular the Energy Efficiency Directive, the Energy Performance of Buildings Directive and the Governance Regulation, including implementation.
Discussions on the Circular Economy, sustainability, fire safety, the implementation of the Paris Agreement and EU GHG reduction goals for 2050.
